section.title: lstroke
section.para: Strokes the current path with a tiled pattern of the image data from the specified layer. This instruction completes the current path. Future path instructions will begin a new path.

listitem.para: The channel mask to apply when filling the current path in the specified layer.
The layer whose path should be filled.
The index of the line cap style to use. This can be either butt (0), round (1), or square (2).
The index of the line join style to use. This can be either bevel (0), miter (1), or round (2).
The thickness of the stroke to draw, in pixels.
The layer to use as the pattern.
